summary.description: A short summary of the task.

description.description: A longer description of the task for assignees to understand the assigned task.
description.example: An electric bell is a mechanical or electronic bell that functions by means of an electromagnet. When an electric current is applied, it produces a repetitive buzzing, clanging or ringing sound.

owners.description: A list of user Ids that own this task and cana modify it.

assignees.description: User Ids that have been assigned to this task and can access its details and submit circuits against the task.

items.description: Circuit Ids that have been submitted for this task.
